articles.author: Jagmeet Singh
articles.title: Tesla finally enters India — nine years after Elon Musk first teased its debut - TechCrunch
articles.description: Tesla has made its long-awaited entry into India with the opening of its first showroom in Mumbai.
articles.content: Tesla has made its long-awaited entry into India with the opening of its first showroom nine years after CEO Elon Musk first teased the move in April 2016 and following years of delays and shifting t… [+4568 chars]
